subtitle: An easy recipe using pork escalopes that are coated in breadcrumbs and fried.

method.text: Using a meat mallet or rolling pin, flatten the pork between two sheets of greaseproof paper into thin escalopes.
Place the beaten egg in a shallow dish. Tip the breadcrumbs onto a plate.
Dip the escalopes into the egg; then coat with the breadcrumbs, shaking off any excess.
Heat the butter and oil in a large frying pan. Fry the escaopes until golden brown. Keep warm while cooking the remaining escalopes.

title: Pork escalopes
